definition[0]: the muscle that is between your lungs and your stomach, and that you use when you breathe
definition[1]: a round rubber object that a woman can put inside her vagina to stop her from getting pregnant
definition[2]: a thin round object, especially in a telephone or loudspeaker, that is moved by sound or that moves when it produces sound
definition[3]: a round flat part inside a camera that controls the amount of light that enters the camera
